umbroke

2005-03-18

Are you OK?

The reason I ask is that your umbrella broke in my hand today... it was shocking; I was shocked. The shaft broke where the release latchbutton is, and the handle is no longer. All I did was twist and shake it like always to deraindrop it. This on the first rainy day. The rain smells really good.

So I'm making sure you are OK, and not connected to the orangebrella like ET or a voodoo doll. Still have your handle?

Thanks for the memories,
>
